statement.p: Out of the last 46 days, it rained 12 days. What percent of these days did it rain?

solution.p: We recall that a percent is part/whole scaled by 100. Here we have \displaystyle\frac{{12}}{{46}}={0.26086956521739}. We convert this to a percent by \displaystyle{100}\cdot{0.26086956521739}={26.086956521739} . Lastly we round to two decimal places. The rounded percent is 26.09 .
